actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A concurrent resolution to express the sense of Congress with respect to certain negotiations regarding chemical weapons.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that the President should promote the negotiations involved in drafting a treaty prohibiting chemical weapons. Urges the President to inform the Soviet Union that the United States is willing to negotiate such a treaty on a bilateral basis.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution to express the sense of Congress with respect to certain negotiations regarding chemical weapons.
